attributes.additional_details: Stop Liverpool Care Plan. This is Murder by way of maximum pain and distress and complete loss of dignity.The Prime Minister should stop this now we are supposed to be a caring society. Yes people have to and will die but this can be pain free and with dignity so why do we choose the alternative.How would you want to die?

rejection.details: Please see: Cease use of the Liverpool Care Pathway & stop payments to NHS Trusts for its use
